JobFullDesc: About the Role The Emerging Products claims team is seeking an experienced claims professional to gain diversity in his/her career across US & Canada by handling a variety of complex claim issues. You will report to our Emerging Products Claims Manager (US/CAN) based out of San Francisco. As a Claims Advocate, you will be exposed to cutting edge issues with the opportunity to develop creative paths for claim resolution alongside a leading third-party administrator handling a legacy claims book. If you're ready to reimagine industry norms and have the skills, experience, drive, as well as a strong team mentality - Uber on and get in touch! What You’ll Do Review an existing book of claims commercial policies or insurance programs Uber has inherited through mergers and acquisitionsWork in a cross-functional environment that includes teams from insurance legal, insurance coverage, external vendors, and more, while appropriately escalating coverage concerns and/or contractual issues that may ariseBecome a trusted partner with Uber’s Insurance Litigation team to work
